overview: Memory, affection and devotion. Nair walks through his house with his heart: he sings and blossoms by sharing simplicity and the strong root of his wisdom. It unfolds the power of an unshakable purity; contemplates nature in people and takes the house to the sidewalk. In a flowery gate, it evokes sensitivity and recalls the brevity of being flower, light and love in Jardim Sulacap, a district of Rio de Janeiro composed mostly of military families.
title: A Flor Azul
